Welcome to the Smart Waste Classifier

Use cutting-edge AI to instantly identify your waste. Snap a photo with your camera or upload an image, and our CNN classifier will tell you whether it is a paper, plastic, metal, organic, and more.

üå± Make Recycling Smarter

Join thousands of users making environmentally conscious decisions with AI-powered waste classification.

How It Works

Get instant waste classification in just a few simple steps

1. Capture or Upload

Use your camera or upload an image of the waste item you want to classify.

2. AI Analysis

Our advanced CNN model analyzes your image using machine learning algorithms.

3. Get Results

Receive instant classification with confidence levels and sorting recommendations.

4. Sort Correctly

Follow the guidance to properly sort your waste and help the environment.
